title: Lesson 22
paragraph: Fragility and formality affect how we handle materials and interactions. Reflecting, allocating, and innovating carefully ensures delicate objects and procedures are managed correctly.

words.example: The vase is fragile, handle with care.
She wore a formal dress to the ceremony.
The allocation of funds was approved by the committee.

words.meaning: all the people living in a home
words.example: The household spent the evening together.

words.meaning: to think carefully or show an image
words.example: The mirror reflects her image perfectly.

words.meaning: to focus attention on a task
words.example: He concentrated on his studies for the exam.
Car insurance is mandatory in many countries.

words.meaning: to shine unsteadily or appear briefly
words.example: The candlelight flickered in the breeze.
She exerted influence to change the policy.

words.meaning: to introduce new ideas or methods
words.example: The company continues to innovate in technology.
